MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 1.
Kuala Lum, who I encountered in a bar, seems to be looking for a friend to "play adventurer" with.

It's the next day. Since it's my day off (recently I've been forced to take time off because I've been overworking and falling ill more often than not), I decide to take it easy and have some private time.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor, this way, over here♪

I was going to accompany Kuala Lum on her adventure today, since she pleaded with me her eyes looking up that if I was interested, I should come and see. I'm worried that she might have a bad accident if I leave her alone.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fufu, I'm glad you're here, Conductor.
I was feeling like the party wasn't balanced at all~!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm feeling uneasy because there's no one to help me recover, so since you're here, will you play the role of "monk"? Look at the costumes I've prepared~♪

Kuala Lum hurriedly pulls out costumes and weapons from a box that she always brings with her for some reason. She must have been really looking forward to this "adventure game," because she's unusually forceful and one-sided for such a considerate and caring woman.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Come on, come on, I'll dress you up. I'll make you look like a monk~
Let's get you undressed, Conductor♪
No, I can change my own clothes.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
What? I thought I could make you look like a life-size dress-up doll.
I've always wanted to do that~♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Fufu, today is going to be the day when many dreams come true~♪
As we are having this conversation about such things, two men suddenly jump out from the bushes nearby. They look like a couple of swashbucklers, so I brace myself.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh my goodness~ Looks like the rest of the party is here, too!
We're all here now...I'm so glad you guys are here and not late~♪
Kuala Lum bows politely, then beckons the men who had happily appeared.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Come here, come here~! I'll introduce you to the friends we'll be adventuring with~♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I guess it's the first-time meeting for you, Conductor. These two are the guys I recruited at the bar last night after you went home after a long night of drinking.

Come to think of it, I had gotten drunk last night, probably due to exhaustion.
I remember that I somehow staggered back to my room in the dormitory, but I heard that Kuala Lum was still recruiting people after that.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's right! I did my best~! I worked hard because of my dream~♪

The men walk up to Kuala Lum, whose eyes light up, with a sneer on their faces, and hug her shoulder in a familiar manner, saying things like, "Nice to see you~" and "Geheheh".They are not the kind of thugs that make you feel uncomfortable at first glance, but they are suspicious.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh my goodness~? If you squeeze that hard, it'll hurt. It's hard to move.
Fufu, you're so affectionate~!
Cowering a little like she's in a pickle, Kuala Lum introduces me to the men.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
These are my reliable friends who will be adventuring with us today.
Don Juan's role is "Playboy" and Rob's over here is "Thief"~

The names are very on the nose, as if they are not trying to hide their bad backgrounds.
They also look like small-time thugs, with pierced noses and mohawks.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: By the way, my role is "Warrior". I'm a strong and powerful warrior who protects everyone with my well-trained body and armor, while reaping my enemies with my axe~♪
Warrior? I thought she would have chosen a title like "hero," which is often considered the main character in adventure stories, which Kuala Lum seems to love.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fufu, I could have been a hero, but I tend to prefer the warrior character.
Kind and strong, quiet and clumsy, tough and...

As Kuala Lum let's out an exhale of annoyance as Don Juan and Rob (again, awful names) are excitedly making a fuss. I wonder if these guys are OK.
I have a feeling that their goal is not "adventure" at all.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't worry~. Since they came here, they must be dreamers who love adventure stories just like me. They are pure people who remember the hearts of children even after they grow up~

Don Juan and Rob respond with a frivolous, "Yes, yes!"
And then in a whisper, "Kuala Lum is not going to be pure by the end of the day."

They're even directing their blatant malice at me, saying things like
I'm in the way or why don't they sneak off without me. I'm getting pretty tired of it.

I am a trained military man, even though I am a non-combatant, and I don't think I could beat these ragamuffin-like people. There is no way I would feel good about having harm directed at meand my precious Kuala Lum.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my~? The vibe is kind of bad, but let's all get along~♪

Kuala Lum, trying to soften the mood like a woman,
holds up a shiny polished axe as she speaks.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Enough chit-chat, let's get going, shall we?
Let the fun begin on the adventure we've always dreamed of~♪
Continue to Episode 3.
